meanings.sent1: The man had a browless face.
meanings.sent2: She drew a picture of a browless character.
meanings.sent3: The browless emoji looked surprised without eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The landscape was a browless expanse of smooth skin.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar's tiny, browless face was adorable.

meanings.sent1: The ancient statue had a browless forehead.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted a mysterious, browless figure.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so plain, it seemed browless without any decoration.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was a browless canvas waiting for stars to be painted.
meanings.sent5: The room felt empty and browless without any furniture.
